item.title: Seeing the Internet through a Baby's Eyes
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: My Aunt Lillian just got on the internet for the first time (AOL, of course). Imagine trying to explain the internet to someone who has simply never been on it before -- the possibilities are so great, and so difficult to explain. "If it is blue and underlined you can click it and go someplace" is suddenly a really good tip! We had our first email yesterday and I think I really startled her with our first instant message today.
